name: part_001
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz, IRyS, and Ouro Kronii perform the song 'Steppin' out'.
A visual transition featuring geometric pyramid patterns in pink and blue lights.
Hakos Baelz performs the song '[A]ddiction' solo.

subtitles.original: Steppin' out
subtitles.english: Steppin' out

subtitles.original: ありきたりな僕の
subtitles.english: Break my

subtitles.original: 日々を壊してくれ
subtitles.english: ordinary days.

subtitles.original: 異常なほどの刺激を
subtitles.english: I was looking forward to

subtitles.original: 待ち望んでいたながら
subtitles.english: an extraordinary stimulus.

subtitles.original: ちょっとしたその冒険心は
subtitles.english: That little sense of adventure

subtitles.original: 改札に吸い込まれて
subtitles.english: was sucked into the ticket gate.

subtitles.original: 吐き出され辿り着いた
subtitles.english: And spat out, I arrived at

subtitles.original: 雨降るこの街
subtitles.english: this rainy town.

subtitles.original: 何も感じ得ないまま
subtitles.english: I refuse to die

subtitles.original: 死んで行くのは御免だ
subtitles.english: without feeling anything.

subtitles.original: 終わりの その先も目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming beyond the end!

subtitles.original: 駆け出せ Steppin' out tonight 僕らの確かなまま
subtitles.english: Run out, Steppin' out tonight, just as we are.

subtitles.original: 輝く Steppin' out tonight 待ってるんだぜ 明日が
subtitles.english: Shining, Steppin' out tonight, tomorrow is waiting.

subtitles.original: 抗え Steppin' out tonight 僕らは風の中
subtitles.english: Resist, Steppin' out tonight, we are in the wind.

subtitles.original: それでも Steppin' out tonight 追い掛けてんだ So there's no looking back
subtitles.english: Even so, Steppin' out tonight, I'm chasing it, so there's no looking back.

subtitles.english: Still sticking my neck in
